column1: Kata Robata////Now on to the mouth watering oh so delectable foie gras over scallop nigiri! OMG! It comes 2 to an order and I sometimes could do 4 pieces by myself. It's definitely the first thing I order after I have finished my cocktail. Another thing that I always order first is the uni or foie gras Chawunmushi (sp?)
column2: it's like this yummy egg custard with your choice of uni or foie gras. It takes awhile to cook so order it first.
